H0.text: which approach to psychology focuses on the body especially the brain and nervous system. Biological Psychology

H1.text: which approach to psychology focuses on the body especially the brain and nervous system. Psychophysiology

H2.text: which approach to psychology focuses on the body especially the brain and nervous system. Cognitive Neuroscience

H3.text: which approach to psychology focuses on the body especially the brain and nervous system. Neuropsychology

A4.text: Behavioral neuroscience... is part of the broad, interdisciplinary field of neuroscience, with its primary focus being on the biological and neural substrates underlying human experiences and behaviors

A5.text: Neuropsychology, which relies heavily on the study of the behavior of humans with nervous system dysfunction

A6.text: The term neuropsychology has been applied to lesion studies in humans and animals.

A7.text: Experimental neuropsychology is an approach that uses methods from experimental psychology to uncover the relationship between the nervous system and cognitive function.
